website_summaries.verdict: This set of 36 stones comes in a wooden box, making it a delightful gift for yourself or a loved one.
pros: This set comes with three different size basalt stones for all of your massaging needs
Eight large stones for the back and legs, 12 medium stones for hands and arms, and 16 small stones for the face and neck.Comes packaged in a lovely wooden storage box
cons: Some said that the small stones were too thick

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising- no large stones in set
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with the size of the stones. There are no large stones...3 inch stones are not large and cannot hold heat long. I have a hot stone set and large stones are 5-6 inches and hold heat much longer than smaller stones. I am trying to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Harris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice starter set for hot stone massage
customer_reviews.text: Very nice starter set for hot stone massage. These massage stones do not have any "personality" like individually found stones would. However, they are of good quality, very smooth, and provide a nice even heat that is long lasting. Wooden box is also of nice quality and provides a attractive presentation for the stones. The box will look nice in my office. Great stones to start my collection with.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Basalt Lava Hot Stone Massage Kit with 36 Pieces
customer_reviews.text: The stones arrived quickly and packaged very well. The storage box is beautiful and so far not having any issues on the box locking piece. Highly recommend. Definitely a perfect amount of stones for what I will be using them for in my Massage Business.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Baxter

customer_reviews.title: These will get you by. The small stones are too fat.
customer_reviews.text: Stones are alright but the small stones for fingers/toes are definitely too fat. The other stones are fine but I was expecting different shapes/sizes when in actuality they are all pretty close in size and the exact same shape. None were broken upon arrival which I was happy about (considering other reviews) so A+ there. I'll probably have to upgrade to a more professional set in the future but these will do for now. Good for beginners I suppose. Nothing special here.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zucker

customer_reviews.title: Definitely did not arrive looking like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Received this product in a timely manner. It's an 'ok' set for home massage but definitely not for professional use. The stones don't seem to be able to hold the heat for as long as my other set (different brand), and several of them are not as smooth as they should be. The bottom of the box was cracked and the stones looked as though they had been randomly thrown in it. Definitely did not arrive looking like the picture!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah E.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Don’t purchase this you can’t return it ! It’s not a HOT BOX air doent heat the stones and I warmed my stones and they got cold before I was even done with my client I paid 30$ shipping and now I’m stuck with it ! Very unhappy .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: did not have large stones as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set because they said they had large stones and it was within my budget. I opened it and realized basically all but the small stones were medium-sized and none were large, as advertised. (unfortunately, I've noticed MANY businesses selling Hot Stone sets seem to think that 3" oval stones are large. THEY ARE NOT.) I would consider 3" to be small/medium. I'm very disappointed and will be returning my set.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Galgano

customer_reviews.title: Box came cracked on bottom.
customer_reviews.text: Stones hold the heat really well. Perfect shape. The box came cracked, but it's for my personal use, so it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I am a fan
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these I was a little put off by the uniform shape of each stone... however, the flat sides allow the stones to stack easily in the warmer, so I now consider it a win.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Barakatt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stones nice shapes will purchase again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: rachel ouellette

customer_reviews.title: Missing some stones
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, my box also arrived broken at the hinges. Additionally, I only received 32 stones rather than the 36 described. My box is missing 3 of the mid size stones and 1 of the small stones. The omission of the small stone is not such a big deal, but it would've been nice to have those additional mid size stones.
customer_reviews.author: edhead

customer_reviews.title: Very good Investment
customer_reviews.text: im currently enrolled at our local university doing a certificate in therapeutic sports massage and I needed these stones as it is one of the subject areas we are doing. I must say these stones have been very helpful in my studies and they also came in great condition. I will recommend this product to anyone doing massage therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great order. Solid stones, smooth, works well when stones are conditioned. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Pro Makeup Artist4Life

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping they would hold the heat a little bit longer, but they are still great. The case they come in is also fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Non Zen with Broken rocks
customer_reviews.text: Three of my rocks came broken and now I see I can’t return or replace. I would prefer three whole rocks instead of three broken ones. I think I purchase enough. Not cool
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Stones don't retain heat
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this purchase, the stones do not retain heat well. The boys is worthless and falls apart almost immediately, I wouldn't but this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my selection and my husband and I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my selection and my husband and I have used it a few times. It retains enougj heat to enjoy the massage. Everything came perfect in a box with no damage to any pieces. Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Enza Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the size and overall quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The large stones are the same size as the medium stones. Disappointed in the size and overall quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rumsey

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: It's a good thing I didn't pick the box up loaded,it fell apart. The stones themselves were in fair to poor shape. This has been a powerful lesson On buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: then the texture of the stones does not feel rock like..
customer_reviews.text: One of the stones arrived damaged. Hurt my feelings a little bit... then the texture of the stones does not feel rock like...love the box they came in, smells like childhood blocks... :-)
customer_reviews.author: Queen Guinevere

customer_reviews.title: Good stones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized, smooth stones. Ordered some a couple years ago through the same company and they have held up well so I purchased another set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank You
customer_reviews.text: Britt and Jules were amazing in fixing the problem of a quick put-together-box that got broken within shipping. I purchased the stones as extras and keep most of them in the box. The box does not take up a lot of room, is light and stores well. The all basalt stones are cut and shaped, thus thicker all around thus keeping heat marvelously. The shape, a little strange at first works very well. Thank You, Britt and Jules for making these available.
customer_reviews.author: Marceline Parent

customer_reviews.title: These stones in nice wooden box is what made purchase from this particular ...
customer_reviews.text: These stones in nice wooden box is what made purchase from this particular seller. Unfortunately when revieved my purchase the box was broken up and so were a few of the smaller stones. I kinda feel like I didn't get what I paid for but oh well you win some & you lose some!
customer_reviews.author: GlamGirlAZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought the hot stones for my friend and she loves it! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Carina hansen

customer_reviews.title: Nicely packed very nice box the stones work real well
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packed very nice box the stones work real well
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Product
customer_reviews.text: There are no large stones in the box as described. Only medium and what is call extra small stones.
customer_reviews.author: Clee Cooks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic buy for what you get!!! The box is a really nice touch too!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Wooden Case was Completely Broken
customer_reviews.text: I brought this item for my wife's birthday and never opened the box it came in. I just wrapped in the box it came in. Upon opening the box the back part of the case that the lid attaches to was completely broken off. The stones seemed nice but for $66 I now have to store the stones in plastic bags not the touch I was going for with this gift. The case itself is not well constructed, the wood feels cheap. Save your money and just order stones and not this item with the box.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Donovan Betz

customer_reviews.title: VERY pleased with the high quality of these hot stones
customer_reviews.text: VERY pleased with the high quality of these hot stones. These were the high quality I was looking for, and arrived in perfect condition. The stones are smooth, and the sizing is perfectly what I expected. The storage box is good quality for what it is designed for; it will work for storage. If you're on the fence, go for it; you won't be disappointed! I bought these as a treat for myself for Christmas. and I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sprtwareor

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully packaged in wood box
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. Beautifully packaged in wood box. Impressed with the delivery within 2 days, item not Amazon Prime eligible. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging of the stones is great as is the case they came in!!Good Good Great!!They hold Heat very good as that is exactly what I want them for !!!
customer_reviews.author: Harold R. Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: I am using honeysuckle massage oil with the hot stones ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using honeysuckle massage oil with the hot stones an everyone loves it matter of fact , ineed 8 more big stones, what kind of deal do you have
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package and the bottom of the wood case was broken. After opening the case to look at the stones the inside of the box was covered in mold. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: skyler gilbertson

customer_reviews.title: like reused. I did not like it
customer_reviews.text: The stone very old,like reused. I did not like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ngan N.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Box and Broken a Stone!
customer_reviews.text: This looks quite nice in the picture, but when we opened the box (main box inside of mailing box) there was not fitted corner of the "wooden box" that was still joined together! I believed they must have smiled when they said wooden box! This is something a little bit stronger than "Balsa Wood"! Received the replacement and opened it to find some of the joints of the box coming apart with one of the stones broken in half! Sometimes "bargains" are not bargains at all and this is one of those situations! Pass on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I went out on a limb purchasing these rocks based on the reviews but I ordered them anyway an the reviews were way wrong my box arrived in perfect condition all the stones were there and the box was intact and solid I love them and would defiantly buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: scott.michelle1994

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy this unless you understand the real cost.
customer_reviews.text: Stones are fine...but on the order all the way through the exorbitant shipping fee was blanked out in a light color. At the summary there was no problem. Then I learn the shipping was about $60 for an inexpensive item. I checked my package and it did NOT cost that to send it to me. VERY disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look great, but I didn't realize they needed a special kind of equipment to warm them up.
customer_reviews.author: S S S

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, heavy and presented well
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Came very quick. Just as described. Good quality, heavy and presented well.
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice collection of stones the box is strong and good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you are paying for the box
customer_reviews.text: these are awsome stones but they are over priced from all the other basalt stones becasue they come in a crappy fake wood box. I thought that they were going to be better quality or atleast a real nice box to store them in. Hell No it is not wirth the money
customer_reviews.author: Billy G. Pankey

customer_reviews.title: The Rocks are Great the box however not so much
customer_reviews.text: The wooden box fell apart almost instantly when I tried to fix it I realised 3 of the 4 screws that were to hold the top on were missing
customer_reviews.author: Andre Jones

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for the rocks!
customer_reviews.text: First off the rocks are not as high qaulity as pictured, they are not as smooth and don't have the same color. The box says "Hot Stones 36/pcs set" right on the outside lid...not exactly what you expect from a nice wooden box, mine hasn't fallen apart yet, though I'm sure it will, the hardware seems quite cheap. Lastly the rocks are clearly machined and processed, not hand picked "natural stone," also the box isn't well lined. So do yourself a favor and just buy the rocks and get cloth bags to put them in!! The box is worthless
customer_reviews.author: Matt1981

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these hot stones!! The box they came in is very nice and all stones accounted for!
customer_reviews.author: Melmoon73

customer_reviews.title: The wood box is of good quality and the rocks retain their heat really great
customer_reviews.text: I went out on a limb purchasing these stones based off the other reviews. Don't even listen to them. The wood box is of good quality and the rocks retain their heat really great! They aren't as good as actual river rocks but they retain heat very well. Used with some lotion they slide along the body very nicely. I would recommend these to a friend and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Walter MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: nothing that would otherwise likely be recognized as a 'solar plexus' stone that's great for work on large muscle areas such as
customer_reviews.text: Stones are a bit more 'square' than I was expecting, and there are only small and medium stones, nothing that would otherwise likely be recognized as a 'solar plexus' stone that's great for work on large muscle areas such as the prone back and hips. A decent set for the price nonetheless. Neutral feelings on the box as I tend to store them in the crockpot or roaster that they'll be heated up in.
customer_reviews.author: LKelly

customer_reviews.title: Rocks for mom!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom who recently finished massage school. She loves that they are different sizes! I also purchased the Sivan Health and Fitness 18QHTR Top Massage LArge Professional Hot Stone 18 Quart Heater to go with it. She is able to fit all the rocks in there, plus some small wash clothes. She gave me a massage with the different sized rocks and it was wonderful! They held the heat for about 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Stiles Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Love Love! High Quality
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE AMAZING! Beautiful high quality Psalt stones. The wonderful Bamboo Box smells so great! I put them in a glass bowl, then boil up water, pour it over them, wait for 10 minutes or a little longer, then place them under a towel before I lye down to do my back. The rest I keep wrapped up in a towel before I use them. Aaaaaaaahhhhhh.
customer_reviews.author: Maneater

customer_reviews.title: Comes in a Very Nice Wooden Box
customer_reviews.text: Item is good for Hot Stone massage, however more than half the stones were a bit too small for my preference.
customer_reviews.author: RollerRover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully packaged collection. My wife loves her set of massage stones.
customer_reviews.author: Graham S. Exton

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this product again if I end up needing another set.
customer_reviews.text: It's just the perfect set that I wanted and I really like the case this is definitely a keeper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: large stones faded with use of only 3 times. ...
customer_reviews.text: large stones faded with use of only 3 times. color changed and texture on the rock from smooth to course.
customer_reviews.author: IDGAF

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and packaging
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and packaging. The stones are rather small. If you are looking for a complete set this isn't it. You will need larger stones and placement stones these really don't fit fully the needs for hot stone massage
customer_reviews.author: Avg Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... I was not intending using the box--the rocks are wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Box was crushed as I had read in previous reviews but I was not intending using the box--the rocks are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Layna Norkun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and shape
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and weight Package was professional and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These Hot Stones that go with the warmer seem to just what my daughter was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Variety and number of stones meet everyone ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Variety and number of stones meet everyone of my needs. Attractive wooden case. Very happy with it. Price was phenomenal. But shipping was very pricey. Still, great value
customer_reviews.author: James E. Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Box was delivered with plenty of packaging surrounding it. No cracks, very well taken care of. The kinks must of been worked out with shipping. Stones seem quality. Case is nice. Padding around packing and inside also so the stones didn't shift around.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Work well with stone heater
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and very high quality with the wooden box organizer! I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for basalt rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Solis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy but clearly need to order the heating unit.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for the first time last night. The stones got really hot and seemed to hold their heat for quite a while. The smooth surface was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Almost there!
customer_reviews.text: Stones too thick for toes had to order another set from someone else ! Other than that I liked the set !
customer_reviews.author: rick boerema

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Work well with stone heater. The product is an addition to our pedicures and manicures. Very relaxing as a finish to the service.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Kelley

customer_reviews.title: not desirable for my massage practice
customer_reviews.text: stones were obviously machine shaped. each one was too thick and bulky to handle comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: LWoodlmt

customer_reviews.title: Good Value - Smooth Stones
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted to try hot stone massages out. This kit comes with a ton of stones - so many that we actually have never used all of them at once because it is hard to heat so many in a oven. There are many different sizes and the largest stones have some decent weight on them. It comes with a nice case. Not much to say - it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: 2 star
customer_reviews.text: The Pine box was broken when I got it. I haven't used the rocks yet, so I cant say how long the rocks hold heat for but I'm sure they are good for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Reeve III

product_meta.title: Sivan Health and Fitness Basalt Lava Hot Stone Massage Kit with 36 Pieces *New and Improved Packaging*
product_meta.description: Prepare for a luxurious experience massage with this hot stone massage kitbasalt hot stones are tools of the trade for hot stone massage therapistsmassage tools are cured and hand-polished for the highest qualityhot stone massage therapy increases circulation, facilitates maximum blood for optimum body functioning, increases cell metabolism, thereby increasing the rate at which the body processes nutrients and toxins, increases lymphatic function, increasing detoxification, cleansing and elimination, deep relaxation of muscles helps to alleviate stress and tension, creates a feeling of balance and harmony, gives you a deeper and longer-lasting sense of relaxation basalt stone is an actual stone produced from volcanic eruptions, practitioners of hot stone massage prefer these ancient stones because of their heat-retaining and energizing properties.
feature_bullets: Eight large stones or the back and legs
12 medium stones for hands and arms
16 small stones for the face and neck
Comes packaged in a wooden storage box
